ReleasesÔÉÅ

The AIND Ephys Pipeline releases are tagged with the SpikeInterface version, since the pipeline is mainly built on top of SpikeInterface.

  • si-0.102.1 - March 2025
  • si-0.101.2 - November 2024
  • si-0.100.7 - February 2024
